item.description:
This week we'll gather at the Lincoln Auditorium of the
University of Hartford for a performance of our own Kristina,
who is in the Hartt Symphony Band. They'll be playing the Lord of
the Rings suite by Johan de Maij.

Tickets will be available
at the door.

After the performance we'll find a place to
meet together to discuss things Russian."

Show up a little earlier to allow some extra time for parking and seating!!

group.name: The Hartford Russian Language Meetup Group

item.name: Music Night/Casual Meetup
